original_text:
The daughter of Egypt shall be put to shame;
    she shall be delivered into the hand of a people from the north.”
korean_text: 딸 애굽이 수치를 당하여 북쪽 백성의 손에 붙임을 당하리로다

sentences.original_text: The daughter of Egypt shall be put to shame
she shall be delivered into the hand of a people from the north
